text:
María del Carmen Machi Arroyo, professionally known as Carmen Machi (born 7 January 1963) is a Spanish actress. She's mostly known for her role as Aída García in "7 vidas" and "Aída".
She has also starred in "Hable con ella" (2002), "Descongélate" (2003), "Los Amantes Pasajeros" (2013), "Ocho apellidos vascos" (2014) and "Ocho apellidos catalanes" (2015).
